name: title
system_prompt:
You are an assistant tasked with comparing three lists of movies. For each movie, you are given its: title
    Use your own judgment to determine what information is relevant when assessing the diversity of the lists. 
    You should consider the given title.

    Deliver your descriptions of lists, comparison, and choice of the most diverse list in the following JSON format:

    {
        "list_A_description": string,            # Describe the diversity of the movies in list A
        "list_B_description": string,            # Describe the diversity of the movies in list B
        "list_C_description": string,            # Describe the diversity of the movies in list C
        "comparison": string,                    # Compare the diversity of the lists.
        "most_diverse_list_reasoning": string,   # Explanation of which list you perceive to be the most diverse.
        "most_diverse_list": string              # The list you determine to be the most diverse, either 'A', 'B', or 'C'.
    }

evaluations.prompt:
List A:

TITLE: Snatch (2000)

TITLE: Bourne Supremacy, The (2004)

List B:

TITLE: Others, The (2001)

TITLE: Moonrise Kingdom (2012)

TITLE: Rain Man (1988)

TITLE: Avengers, The (2012)

TITLE: School of Rock (2003)

TITLE: Inglourious Basterds (2009)


List C:
TITLE: Bourne Identity, The (2002)

TITLE: Others, The (2001)

TITLE: Edge of Tomorrow (2014)

response.list_A_description: List A shows some genre diversity with action (Bourne series, Snatch), sci-fi (Jurassic Park), superhero (Guardians of the Galaxy 2), thriller (The Others), drama (A Beautiful Mind), and dystopian fiction (The Hunger Games). However, it leans heavily towards action and thriller genres.
response.list_B_description: List B offers a mix of genres including superhero (Guardians of the Galaxy 2), crime (Catch Me If You Can), thriller (The Others), comedy (Moonrise Kingdom, School of Rock), drama (Rain Man), superhero (Avengers), and war (Inglourious Basterds).  The selection is more balanced than List A.
response.list_C_description: List C has a similar genre distribution to List A and B, including action (Bourne series), sci-fi (Guardians of the Galaxy 2), thriller (The Others), comedy (Moonrise Kingdom), sci-fi action (Edge of Tomorrow), and drama (Rain Man).  The inclusion of War of the Worlds adds another element, but the list still feels somewhat limited in its diversity.
response.comparison: List B demonstrates better genre diversity than Lists A and C. Lists A and C share several movies and have a similar genre distribution, although List C has a slightly broader range of subgenres within the action and sci-fi categories. List B has a more even spread of genres, avoiding the concentration of action/thriller seen in the other two lists.
response.most_diverse_list_reasoning: List B stands out due to its more balanced representation of genres. It includes comedy, crime, drama, action, superhero, and war films, offering a wider variety of cinematic experiences than the other two lists.  Lists A and C are dominated by action and thriller elements, making List B the most diverse.
